input.sentences: setting up the rockets was the boring part .
getting to launch the rockets was awesome .
they went higher than i ever thought .
the rest of the students were jealous of my rocket .
one of the rockets exploded before it ever left the ground .
output.sentences: Today the children will be setting off model rockets.
After the rockets shot into the air, the payload gently drifted down.
Between launches they took a break to learn about how rockets fly.
Then they shot the rockets into the sky again!
